title: Total.War.ATTILA.The.Last.Roman.ADDON-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Total.War.ATTILA.The.Last.Roman.
                          [ ADDON-KaOs ]-                   
                                                            
Language:-----------------[ English ]-                      
                                                            
Archive/Count/Volume:-----[ RAR 44x50M =  = 2.03GIG ]-      
                                                            
Release/Date:-------------[ 27-06-2015 ]-                   
                                                            
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                     
                                                            
Iso/Crack:----------------[ Reloaded ]-                     
                                                            
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Nothing ]-                      
                                                            
Movie/Recode:-------------[ Untouched ]-                    
                                                            
Audio/Recode:-------------[ Untouched ]-                    
                                                            
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Untouched ]-                    
                                                            
Rebuild/Temp/Space:-------[ Estimated 10.05GIG Free ]-      
                                                            
Final/Used/Space:---------[ 21GIG Inc Base Game ]-          


Step-1:-------[ UnRAR To Your Games Root Folder                
                Or Use Our Install.exe                         
                                                               
              ( Ensure The Location Is Correct When Installing 
                To A Non KaOs Release When Using Install.exe ) 
                                                               
Step-2:-------[ Run ~Unpack~.bat To Unpack/Rebuild ]-          
                                                               
              ( Our Install.exe Does This Step For You )       
                                                               
Step-3:-------[ Click Attila.exe To Play                       
                Or Use The Created Desktop Shortcut ]-         
                                                               
                                                               
Time: About 20 Mins On A SSD                        8 Cores [*]
                                                    4 Cores [ ]
                                                               
ADDON:                                                         
                                                               
This Is An ADDON Release And Requires One Of The Following     
To Be Installed. Other Unmodified Versions Should Also Be      
Compatible.                                                    
                                                               
Total.War.Attila-KaOs                                          
Or                                                             
Total.War.Attila-CPY                                           
                                                               
                                                               
Includes:                                                      
                                                               
-  Huge new Campaign Map                                       
-  New Expedition' faction with new gameplay features          
-  5 Playable Factions with additional new Units,              
   Tech and Buildings                                          
-  A dramatic story-based, campaign challenge                  



We Recommend Installing To A Short Path (Like The Install.exe  
Default) As Long Path Names Can Cause Missing Files On Certain 
Games During Rebuild.                                          
Unless You Changed It The Default Extraction Folder Install.exe
Creates Is C:/Games/                                           
This Is Were You Can Find The Games exe.                       
                                                               
-> If Install/Rebuild Seems To Freeze Leave It Alone <-        
This Is Caused By Temp Files Been Created Or Relocated         
And Can Take Alot Of Time Depending On The Size Of The Game.   
                                                               
Install/Rebuild Is Normally Very Time/Space Consuming.         
(So Ensure You Have Pleanty Of Space And Patience)             



**FALSE-POSITIVES**                                           
                                                              
In Some Cases Some Of Our Tools May Get Detected As Suspicious
Or As A Virus By Some Antivirus Software. This Is Also The    
Case With Some Cracks/NoDVDs. We Assure You This Is A False   
Possitive And All Our Files Are Clean. If Any Of These Files  
Are Deleted The Chances Are The Game Will Not Start Or Will   
Function Incorrectly.                                         




UPLOADER NOTES:

i tested this on the cpy version and it worked fine.

it is easier to unrar yourself into your game folder and run unpack.bat

as the installer defaults to the kaos release and you need to change it manually
